data.rewards_program_description: Earn 5X points on travel purchased through Chase Travel portal, 3X points on dining, select streaming services, and online groceries, 2X points on other travel purchases, and 1X points on all other purchases. Additional 5X points on Lyft rides through March 2025. 10% anniversary points bonus on total purchases made in the previous year.
data.rewards_expiration_detail: Points don't expire while account remains open
data.rewards_redemption_options: Points can be redeemed for travel through Chase portal (25% bonus value), 1:1 point transfers to travel partners, statement credits, gift cards, or merchandise. No blackout dates when booking through Chase Travel.

benefits.benefit_description: $50 annual hotel credit for stays purchased through Chase Travel
Up to $10 off monthly on non-restaurant DoorDash orders

incentives.incentive_description: Earn 60,000 bonus points after spending $4,000 in first 3 months
